description: Survey of patient reported outcomes of minimally invasive glaucoma surgery (MIGS)
purpose: Survey of patient reported outcomes to assess the impact of glaucoma and treatment, including minimally invasive glaucoma surgery (MIGS), on health-related quality of life (HRQOL)
shortName: Glaucoma Outcomes Survey Impact of Vision on Your Life
name: Glaucoma Outcomes Survey

items.question: How often do you wear corrective lenses such as glasses or contact lenses when you are awake?

answers.text: I wear glasses or contact lenses all the time or almost all the time
I wear glasses or contact lenses most of the time
I wear glasses or contact lenses some of the time
I wear glasses or contact lenses a little of the time
I never wear glasses or contact lenses

items.question: 1. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to watch television?

answers.text: Unable to watch television because of eyesight
Unable to watch television for another reason

items.question: 2. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to go up or down steps, stairs, or curbs?

answers.text: Unable to go up or down steps, stairs, or curbs because of eyesight
Unable to go up or down steps, stairs, or curbs for another reason

items.question: 3. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to get around outdoors?

answers.text: Unable to get around outdoors because of eyesight
Unable to get around outdoors for another reason

items.question: 4. How difficult is it for you to see street signs during the day?

answers.text: Unable to see street signs during the day

items.question: 5. How difficult is it for you to see indoors in dim light?

answers.text: Unable to see at night in dim light

items.question: 6. How difficult is it for you to see street signs at night in dim light?

answers.text: Unable to see street signs at night

items.question: 7. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to drive at night?

answers.text: Unable to drive at night because of eyesight
Unable to drive at night for another reason

items.question: 8. How difficult is it for you to drive due to glare from oncoming headlights?

answers.text: Unable to drive because of glare
Unable to drive because of eyesight unrelated to glare
Unable to drive for another reason

items.question: 9. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to see different colors?
10. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to see people who approach you from the side?

answers.text: Unable to see people who approach from the side

items.question: 11. How difficult is it for you to see things off to the side of your vision?

answers.text: Unable to see things off to the side of my vision

items.question: 12. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to recognize people when they are close to you?

answers.text: Unable to recognize people when they are close to me

items.question: 13. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to recognize people from across a room?

answers.text: Unable to recognize people from across a room

items.question: 14. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to read a printed newspaper or book?

answers.text: Unable to read a printed newspaper or book because of eyesight
Unable to read a printed newspaper or book for another reason

items.question: 15. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to read small print on medicine bottles, telephone books, legal forms, or bills you receive in the mail?

answers.text: Unable to read small print because of eyesight
Unable to read small print for another reason

items.question: 16. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to find an item on a crowded shelf?

answers.text: Unable to find an item on a crowded shelf because of eyesight
Unable to find an item on a crowded shelf for another reason

items.question: 17. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to use a computer?

answers.text: Unable to use a computer because of eyesight
Do not use a computer for another reason

items.question: 18. Have you increased the font size, brightness, or contrast on your computer to make it easier to use?
19. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to use a cellphone?

answers.text: Unable to use a cellphone because of eyesight
Do not use a cellphone for another reason

items.question: 20. Have you increased the font size, brightness, or contrast on your cellphone to make it easier to use?
21. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to write?

answers.text: Unable to write because of eyesight
Unable to write because of another reason

items.question: 22. Because of your eyesight, how difficult is it for you to do housework?

answers.text: Unable to do housework because of eyesight
Unable to do housework for another reason

items.question: 23. Because of your eyesight, how limited are you in doing your daily activities?

answers.text: Unable to do daily activities because of eyesight
Unable to do daily activities for another reason

items.question: 24. Because of your eyesight, how much less do you accomplish than you would like?

answers.text: I accomplish as much as I would like
I accomplish a little less than I would like
I accomplish somewhat less than I would like
I accomplish a lot less than I would like because of eyesight
I accomplish a lot less than I would like for another reason

items.question: 25. Because of your eyesight, how limited are you in how long you can work at a paying job?

answers.text: I did not have a paying job in the last 7 days
Unable to work because of eyesight
Do not work at a paying job for another reason

items.question: 26. How difficult is it for you to see in bright sunlight?

answers.text: Unable to see in bright sunlight

items.question: 27. In the last 7 days, how much of a problem did you have with eye redness?

answers.text: A little bit of a problem

items.question: 28. In the last 7 days, how much of a problem did you have with your eyes being sensitive to indoor lights?

answers.text: A little bit of a problem

items.question: 29. In the last 7 days, how much of a problem did you have with your eyes being sensitive to sunlight?

answers.text: A little bit of a problem

items.question: 30. In the last 7 days, how much of a problem did you have with blurry vision?

answers.text: A little bit of a problem

items.question: 31. In the last 7 days, how much of a problem did you have with itching in or around your eyes?

answers.text: A little bit of a problem

items.question: 32. In the last 7 days, how often did you feel like something was irritating your eyes?
33. In the last 7 days, how drowsy or tired did you feel during the day from the drops you used to treat your glaucoma?

answers.text: Did not feel drowsy or tired at all
Felt a little drowsy or tired
Did not use drops to treat my glaucoma in the last 7 days

items.question: 34. In the last 7 days, how annoyed did you feel by your eyesight?

answers.text: Did not feel annoyed at all

items.question: 35. In the last 7 days, how angry did you feel by your eyesight?

answers.text: Did not feel angry at all

items.question: 36. In the last 7 days, how concerned or worried were you about your safety at home because of your eyesight?

answers.text: Did not feel concerned or worried at all about my safety at home
Felt a little bit concerned or worried about my safety at home
Felt somewhat concerned or worried about my safety at home
Felt very concerned or worried about my safety at home
Felt concerned or worried about my safety at home for another reason

items.question: 37. In the last 7 days, how worried were you about your eyesight?

answers.text: Not worried at all about my eyesight
A little bit worried about my eyesight

items.question: 38. In the last 7 days, how worried were you about losing your job because of your eyesight?

answers.text: I did not have a job in the last 7 days
Not worried at all about losing my job
A little bit worried about losing my job
Somewhat worried about losing my job
Very worried about losing my job
Worried about losing my job for another reason

items.question: 39. Because of your eyesight, how much do you have to rely on other people to do things?

answers.text: Do not rely on other people
Rely a little on other people
Rely a lot on other people
Rely on other people for another reason

items.question: 40. In the last 7 days, how concerned were you about how your glaucoma treatment affects the way you look?

answers.text: Not concerned at all about how my glaucoma treatment affects the way I look
A little bit concerned about how my glaucoma treatment affects the way I look
Somewhat concerned about how my glaucoma treatment affects the way I look
Very concerned about how my glaucoma treatment affects the way I look
Concerned about the way I look for another reason

items.question: 41. In the last 7 days, how fearful were you about what might happen in the future because of glaucoma?

answers.text: Not fearful at all about what might happen in the future
A little bit fearful about what might happen in the future
Somewhat fearful about what might happen in the future
Very fearful about what might happen in the future
Fearful about what might happen in the future for another reason

items.question: 42.	Because of your glaucoma treatment, are you less interested in sex?

answers.text: Yes, a little less interested in sex because of my glaucoma treatment
Yes, somewhat less interested in sex because of my glaucoma treatment
Yes, a lot less interested in sex because of my glaucoma treatment

items.question: 43. How satisfied are you with your microinvasive glaucoma surgery (MIGS)?

answers.text: I have not had microinvasive glaucoma surgery (MIGS)
I don’t know if I have had microinvasive glaucoma surgery (MIGS)

items.question: 44. Based on what you know, do you think your glaucoma is mild, moderate, or severe?

answers.text: I do not have glaucoma yet
I do not know the severity of my glaucoma
